Package de.unisiegen.tpml.core.smallstep

Interface Summary
SmallStepProofContext Base interface to context related information and methods when determining the next small steps in the implementation of the AbstractSmallStepProofRuleSet.
SmallStepProofNode Base interface to nodes in a SmallStepProofModel.
SmallStepProofRule Base interface for small step proof rules.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSmallStepProofRuleSet Abstract base class for small step proof rule sets.
DefaultSmallStepProofContext Default implementation of the SmallStepProofContext interface.
DefaultSmallStepProofNode Default implementation of the SmallStepProofNode interface.
DefaultSmallStepProofRule Default implementation of the SmallStepProofRule interface.
SmallStepProofModel The heart of the small step interpreter.
